downloadSection.title: Start Creating Anytime, Anywhere
downloadSection.description: With the AI ToEarn mobile app, your creativity is no longer limited to desktop. We also provide iOS and Android mobile apps for you to unleash your creativity anytime, anywhere, with just one phone!

enterpriseSection.title: Professional AI Social Media Solutions
enterpriseSection.subtitle: Enterprise AI marketing transformation requires not just tools, but solid infrastructure. AI ToEarn provides a reliable platform to distribute AI content creation capabilities across multiple departments for unparalleled marketing efficiency.

testimonial.quote: In today's highly competitive content marketing landscape, rapid validation and creation tools are not just helpful—they're essential for survival. For marketing companies like ours, AI ToEarn provides indispensable value in this AI frontier.
testimonial.author: John Smith
testimonial.title: Content Operations Director at Leading MCN Agency

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Instructions
dataDeletion.prelaunch: Our application is currently in pre-launch phase and does not store real user data. If you have interacted with our test systems, contact us for data removal.
